name: Robert "Kool" Bell
description: '''Robert Earl "Kool" Bell''' (born October 8, 1950), also known by the name '''Muhammad Bayyan''', is an American musician, singer and [[songwriter]]. He is the last surviving founding member of the American [[Rhythm and blues|R&B]], [[Soul music|soul]], [[funk]] and [[disco]] band [[Kool & the Gang]].
